loans.name: Vicent

texts.en:
Vicent lives in Hoima, Uganda.  He is twenty-four years old, married with one child aged one and a half years. He deals in buying and selling warangi (a distilled beverage) and that business is supplemented by income from his farming and taxi (transport) business.

Limited capital is a hindrance to his business.  He is accessing credit to buy more waragi to sell.
His dream is to build a commercial house to increase his sources of revenue.

loans.use: to buy more waragi to sell.

loans.name: Olesya

texts.en:
Olesya works as a secretary/cashier. She is not married and lives with her parents in a house. The house is old and need remodelling. Olesya decided to help her parent remodel the house. She is asking for a loan of 12,000 hryvnias that are needed to remodel the bathroom. This will be a good start in remodeling the whole house.
Olesya is a volonteer in a Christian children ministry helping many kids to learn and apply healthy family and human values.

loans.use: to fix the bath room at her parents house

loans.name: Na Tau 3 Group

texts.en:
Hong is young Thai lady at the age of 19 who is elected as team leader of Na Tau 3 Group. She lives with her husband and his family, which consists of his parents and younger sister. Her family mainly rely on agricultural production for living, such as raising pigs, ducks and cultivating rice. In order to contribute more in family's income, her husband works as a car driver. 

This is her first loan in Anh Chi Em Program and she will use a portion of the loan to buy small fish so that she could support her family by expanding business. Hong said that she was very interested in participating in Anh Chi Em not only because she would have capital for her small project but also she would have chance to enlarge her knowledge about agriculture techniques as well as social issues, which she heard much when Anh Chi Em came to her village and introduced about its activities. 

Hong hopes that, with the financial and non-financial support from Anh Chi Em, she could improve significantly earnings for the family. In the picture, Hong wears a pink shirt and stands in the first line.

loans.use: to buy small fish

loans.name: Vasil

texts.en: Vasil has worked his whole life as forester. He built his house himself, helped his two sons to grow up and get married and now enjoys his retired life. His grand children visit Vasil each summer. He want to fix an extra room his house, so there is more space for the grand children when they come. Vasyl is asking for a loan of 10,000 gryvnas. He just put new door and needs to put new windows and do some finishing work inside the room.

loans.use: to fix one extra room in a house

loans.name: Valentina

texts.en: Valentina is a successful entrepreneur from the Kahovka. She sells footwear in one of the local markets and she has been in this trade for 18 years. Valentina says she is happy to be able to provide for her family and realizes they have everything they need for normal life. Moreover, she enjoys working with people on a daily basis, learning to serve her customers better and getting more experience along the way. Valentina is requesting a 10,000 Gryvna loan to re-stock her inventory for the summer season.

loans.use: to increase the assortment of women's shoes

loans.name: Janet

texts.en:
Thirty three  year old Janet deals in produce mainly maize, beans and nuts in Hoima Uganda. She is married and charged with a responsibility of taking care of four children and all go to school. She hopes to increase on her capital and family welfare. Limited capital coupled with competition and price fluctuation limit her clientile thus reduced sales.
She is accessing credit to buy more maize, beans and nuts for sell.

loans.use: to buy more maize, beans and nuts for sell.

loans.name: Simon

texts.en:
Simon deals in produce majorly maize, rice and nuts in Hoima Uganda. He is twenty nine years old and married with four children and three attend school. Farming supplements his income. He hopes to build a residential house. Scarcity of supply hinders his business.
He is acquiring a loan to buy more maize to sell.

loans.use: to buy more maize to sell

loans.name: Dúo Mujeres Del Rey Group

texts.es:
DÚO MUJERES DEL REY
Este grupo formado por doña María de 39 años de edad, quien es la líder de este grupo, es casada y sus hijos  ya no viven con ella, trabaja vendiendo tortillas, todos los días y los fines de semana hace tamales y toneles para vender y gracias a Dios todo lo termina, está solicitando este crédito porque necesita comprar leña y maíz, porque si compra solo poquito no le hace cuenta porque gasta más  y su ganancia no es suficiente ahora que le están ofreciendo una camionada de leña quiere comprarlo y espera que fape le pueda apoyar,
texts.en:
Duo Mujeres del Rey (Two Women of the King)

Maria, 39 years old, is the leader of this group. She is married, and her children no longer live with her. She works selling tortillas every day. On the weekends, she makes tamales to sell, and thanks to God, all of them sell. She is requesting this loan because she needs to purchase firewood and corn. If she only buys a little bit, the math won't work out because it will cost more (the unit cost will be more), and her profit is slim. Now that they are selling a cord of wood, she wants to buy it, and she hopes that Kiva partner FAPE can help her.

loans.use: to purchase firewood wholesale.

loans.name: John

texts.en: John aged 46, lives in Hoima, Uganda. He is married and charged with the responsibility of taking care of five children aged between 26 and 6 and three attend school. He deals in produce buying and selling mainly maize and beans. He gets additional income from farming and rentals. He is an honest and hardworking man who desires to buy a motorcycle to ease transportation in the course of business transactions. Price fluctuation is his major challenge. John is requesting for a loan to buy more maize and beans to sell.

loans.use: to buy more maize and beans to sell.

loans.name: Henry

texts.en: Henry aged 59, lives in Hoima, Uganda. He is a married tailor and charged with the responsibility of taking care of ten children and five attend school. Farming supplements income earned from tailoring. He is a hardworking man who desires to to complete his house. Change in seasons affects his business. Henry is acquiring a loan facility to finish his house.

loans.use: to finish his house

loans.name: Frank

texts.en:
Frank is a single, hard working man, aged thirty, dealing in produce alongside farming in Hoima Uganda. He started this business so as to improve on his standard of living. He hopes to buy a car for himself. Price fluctuations hinder his business.
He is acquiring a loan to buy more maize to sell.

loans.use: to buy more maize for sell

loans.name: Nyansio

texts.en:
Nyansio lives in Hoima Uganda. He is 42 years old married and charged with a responsibility of taking care of seven children and three attend school. He deals in produce buying and selling and earns side income from farming. He hopes to build a commercial building in a busy trading centre so as to diversify his sources of income.
Price fluctuation and seasonal changes affect his business.
He is acquiring credit to buy maize to sell.

loans.use: to buy maize to sell

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy fabric and a sewing machine.

loans.name: Alima

texts.fr:
Âgée de 59 ans elle réside à Agoè avec  son mari et ses huit enfants.  Elle est commerçante de charbon de bois depuis 1983. Elle s’approvisionne une fois par mois au marché de Takpeba à Mango à environ 500 km de Lomé et  revend le charbon à domicile.
Elle sollicite ce prêt pour agrandir son commerce et  augmenter ses bénéfices afin de s’occuper de sa famille et participer  aux dépenses.
texts.en:
59 years old, she resides in Agoè with her ​​husband and eight children. She has been retailing charcoal since 1983.

She resupplies once a month at the Takpeba market in Mango, about 500 km from Lomé, and resells the charcoal from her  home.

She is requesting this loan to expand her business and increase profits, to take care of her family and contribute towards expenses.

loans.use: buy 90 bags of charcoal

loans.name: Noussouglo

texts.fr:
Née en 1940, elle est veuve et mère de six(06) enfants. Résidente à Bè, elle fait  l’achat et la vente des boissons alcoolisées (Sodabi) et d’autres tisanes. Elle s’approvisionne une fois par mois au marché de Tabligbo  et Ahépé  et revend à la devanture de sa maison.
Elle sollicite ce microcrédit pour agrandir son commerce en prenant plus de bouteilles de boissons au marché et augmenter ces bénéfices
texts.en:
Born in 1940, she is a widow and the mother of six children. A resident of Bè, she buys and sells alcoholic beverages (Sodabi - West African palm wine liqueur used in local ceremonies) and other herbal teas.

She resupplies once a month at the Tabligbo and Ahépé markets, and resells at her housefront. 

She is requesting this micro-credit loan to expand her business by purchasing more bottles of beverage at the market and increasing her profits.

loans.use: buy five containers of alcoholic beverages and three assortments of herbal teas

loans.name: Luis Evaristo

texts.es:
Luis Evaristo tiene 32 años de edad, vive junto con su conviviente, en el distrito de Cayaltí, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicad en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte en motocarguera y mototaxi que permite a comerciantes trasladar su mercadería con mayor facilidad a las zonas aledañas al distrito, junto con su esposa se dedican a la venta de producto naturales a pedido, cuentan con clientela considerable, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1 000 nuevos soles para actualizar tarjetas de propiedad de sus unidades vehiculares.
texts.en:
Luis Evaristo is 32 years old and lives together with his partner in the district of Cayalti, a community that engages in agriculture, commerce and livestock farming, located in the province of Chiclayo which belongs to the region Lambayeque on the northern coast of Peru.

He makes a living providing transport services in the form of a motorcycle rickshaw and motorcycle taxi, which permits merchants to transport their merchandise with greater ease to zones far away from the district. Together with his wife, he makes a living selling natural products made to order, and he has a considerable clientele. He has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa of 1,000 nuevos soles to renew the property cards of his vehicles.

loans.use: to renew his vehicles' property cards

loans.name: Basilia

texts.en:
Basilia works hard to support her family. Basilia is widowed and has a general store business in the Philippines.

Basilia requested a 35,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) loan through NWTF to purchase additional items like cooking oil, noodles, canned goods, soft drinks, detergent soap, etc., to sell.

Basilia has been in this business for nine years now.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her general store business.

In the future, Basilia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional items like cooking oil, noodles, canned goods, soft drinks, detergent soap, etc., to sell

loans.name: Deisy Hudubella

texts.es:
Deysi Hudubella tiene 24 años de edad, vive junto con sus dos hijos a cargo en el distrito de Oyotún, una comunidad pequeña que se dedican a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad desde hace varios años, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de productos de primera necesidad y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Deysi Hudubella is 24 years old and lives together with her two children in the district of Oyotun, a small community that engages in agriculture, commerce and livestock farming, located in the province of Chiclayo which belongs to the region Lambayeque, on the northern coast of Peru.

She has made a living selling products of first necessity for several years. She has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa of 1,000 nuevos soles for the purchase of products of first necessity and in this way generate greater income for her family.

loans.use: to buy products of first necessity and in this way generate greater income for her family

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and overlock sewing machine, and to renovate her workplace.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to pay for his son's tuition fees and other school expenses.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine and renovate her workplace.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy an oversewing machine, an embroidery machine and fabric.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy flour, cheese, yeast, baking powder, butter and sugar

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
Emma is 31 years old and married with two children. With one child currently in school, Emma works very hard to provide for them.

Emma runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 10,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) loan through NWTF to buy more stock to sell in her general store.

Emma has been in this business for two years and sells a variety of items such as shampoo, noodles, candies, biscuits, detergent soap, etc. 

Emma would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell in her general store

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Evelyn works hard to support her family.

She has a dress-making business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from raising pigs. Evelyn is borrowing 10,000 PHP through NWTF to buy additional materials like fabric, zippers, buttons, and needles for her business.

Evelyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past two loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional materials like fabric, zippers, buttons, and needles for her dress-making business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more grocery products and a generator, and renovate his workplace.

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
Gemma is 42 years old and married with three children. With one child currently in school, Gemma works very hard to provide for them.

Gemma runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional groceries to sell in her general store.

Gemma has been in this business for three years and sells a variety of items such as snack foods, canned goods, diapers, sanitary pads, noodles, juice, milk, etc.

Gemma would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Benard

texts.en: Benard is 34 years old and lives in Hoima, Uganda. He's married with three children between the ages of one and nine, and two of them attend school. He buys and sells beans and maize and gets additional income from farming and a boda boda (transport) business. He started the business to generate income and improve his standard of living. He desires to build a residential house and educate his children.Weather fluctuations affect his business, and he will use the money to increase his stock of beans and maize.

loans.use: to increase his stock of beans and maize.

loans.name: Frank

texts.en:
Frank sells soda and beer in addition to farming and butchery in Hoima, Uganda. He is thirty-eight years old, married with five children and three attend school. He hopes to build a good residential house. Price fluctuation hinders his business.

He is acquiring a loan to buy a car for personal use.

loans.use: to buy a car for personal use.

loans.name: Eunevie

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Eunevie works hard to support her family.

She has a business raising pigs in the Philippines and also earns additional income from a fish pond. Eunevie is borrowing 10,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase feed and vitamins for raising her pigs.

Eunevie has been sustaining her business activities through her past 2 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money so she can afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase feed and vitamins for her pig.

loans.name: Na Tau 4 Group

texts.en:
Dung is 30 years old, and lives in an old, small, traditional Thai house with her husband, four children, and her mother-in-law who is at an advanced age. Her 2-year-old son and 5-year-old daughter are looked after by kindergarten while the two other daughters attend secondary school. Dung and her husband have had to work so hard to cover living expenses for the family. Dung works in agriculture productions such as cultivating rice, ducks and pigs while her husband works for local construction employers. 

This is her first loan in the Anh Chi Em Program and she will use a portion of the loan to buy bran for ducks. Dung hopes that, through the loan and training support from Anh Chi Em, she will improve her family's income so that she could afford to buy some new furniture for the house. 

Dung dreams that her children will be successful and abundant in life, and that they will escape from poverty. In the picture, she is the woman who has a pretty smile, wearing a white shirt and standing first on the right.

loans.use: to buy bran for ducks.

loans.name: Dinora

texts.es: Dinora tiene 28 años es madre soltera y habita junto a su madre, sobrina y su hijo. Ella se se dedica a la prestación de servicios domésticos desde hace mucho tiempo lo cual le permite llevar el sustento a su hogar y mantener la economía de su familia. Actualmente, su vivienda carece de ventanas solo cuenta con balcones por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cuatro ventanas para la vivienda. Espera poder contar con dicho financiamiento y así poder proceder a la mejora lo antes posible.
texts.en: Dinora is 28 years old. She is a single mother and lives with her mother, her niece, and her son. She has made a living for a long time by offering domestic services, which allows her to feed and clothe her family and maintain the family economy. Currently her home is lacking windows. It only has balconies, which is why she is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of four windows for her home. She hopes to be able to get this financing so she can proceed with the improvements as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy four windows for her home

loans.name: Gulnora

texts.ru: Гулноре 33 года. Она вместе с мужем занимается животноводством. У Гулноры двое детей, им по 7 и 10 лет. Гулнора разводит коров и быков в течение 10 лет. Ее этому делу еще в юности научили родители. В семье Гулноры главным источником дохода является животноводство. Поэтому она решила расширить деятельность. Гулнора просит кредит для приобретения пару быков хорошей породы. Таким образом она хочет увеличить прибыль от бизнеса и поднять семейный бюджет.
texts.en: Gulnora is 33, married, and has two children aged 7 and 10.  She and her husband raise livestock for a living; in particular, they've been raising cows and bulls for 10 years.  Her parents taught her the ropes when she was young.  It's the main source of income for her family, and, accordingly, Gulnora would like to expand her farming activities.  She's requesting a loan to buy a couple of bulls of good stock.  By doing so, she hopes to make her farm more profitable and bolster her family's finances.

loans.use: buy two bulls of good pedigree for fattening and resale

loans.name: Afi

texts.fr:
Résidente à Bè âgée de 33 ans, elle est célibataire avec un enfant en charge. Elle fait le petit commerce des produits cosmétiques, et fait aussi les pédicure et les manucures sans oublier les denrées alimentaires. Elle s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au grand marché de Lomé et revend dans son quartier à Bè.
Elle sollicite ce prêt pour agrandir son commerce et  faire augmenter ces bénéfices afin de subvenir aux besoins de son enfant.
texts.en:
A 33-year-old resident of Bè, she is single with a child under her care. She is a retail merchant of cosmetics, provides pedicure and manucure services, and also retails food products.

She resupplies twice a month at the big market in Lomé, and resells in her neighborhood in Bè.

She is requesting this loan to expand her business and increase her benefits, so she can meet her child's needs.

loans.use: buy 2 boxes of nail varnish and 5 boxes of deodorants

loans.name: Ludivina

texts.en:
Ludivina is 54 years old and has nine children. She is married and has four children who are currently in school.

Ludivina is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional livestock for her business.

Ludivina has been raising livestock for 15 years now, and has borrowed four times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Ludivina would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional livestock for her business

loans.name: Marites

texts.en:
Marites works hard to support her family. She is married and has a livestock raising business in the Philippines.

She has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase vitamins, feeds and other supplies for her business. She has been in this business for 5 years now.

Marites would like to build and expand her business to secure her family's future.

loans.use: to purchase vitamins, feeds and other supplies for her business

loans.name: Mercy

texts.en:
Mercy is a married woman with two children who are in school. She is 40 years old and is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Mercy has a general store business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional groceries to sell in her general store. She has been in this business for 2 years. 

In the future, Mercy would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for her daughter's education.

loans.name: Sherly

texts.en:
Sherly is 35 years old, married and has two children who are currently in school.

She is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs. She has been in pig fattening for 4 years now, and has borrowed 4 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Sherly would like to build and expand her business to secure her family's future.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Señor Cautivo De Ayabaca Group

texts.es: Este es el Grupo “Señor Cautivo de Ayabaca” que está constituido por 06 socios responsable. Miriam de 23 años de edad es separada con 01 hijo dependientes. Miriam es empleada municipal. Viene desempeñándose hace más de 02 años donde todo le va bien. A si mismo tiene el deseo de implementar su negocio venta de CD. Se siente feliz por darle una mejor educación a su único hijo. Es por ello que solicitó el crédito para la compra de CD, USB y carcasas para iphone. El grupo “Señor Cautivo de Ayabaca” agradece a los inversionistas Kiva que hicieron posible este crédito. Miriam es la primera del lado derecho, viste bivirí verde con rayas blanca.
texts.en: This is the “Señor Cautivo de Ayabaca” group. It has six responsible members. 23-year-old Miriam is separated with one dependent child. Miriam has been a municipal employee for more than two years and it is going well. She wishes to start her own business selling CDs. She feels happy to be able to give her only child a better education, which is why she requested this loan in order to buy CDs, USBs, and iPhone cases. The “Señor Cautivo de Ayabaca” group is grateful to the Kiva investors who made this loan possible. Miriam is the first from the right. She is wearing a green tank top with white stripes.

loans.use: to buy CDs, USBs, and iPhone cases

loans.name: Carla Del Rocio

texts.es:
Carla es una joven emprendedora, tiene 21 años de edad, es soltera y vive en Chiclayo junto a su familia.
Es una persona con muchas ganas de salir adelante. Actualmente estudia Enfermería en la Universidad y kle va muy bien porque es una buena estudiante. También trabaja como vendedora de lencería, es una joven exitosa porque es muy responsable, trabajadora y sobre todo respetuosa y amable con los clientes.
Carla está agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mercadería para implementar el negocio. De esta manera obtendrá mayores ingresos con el que podrá ayudar a su familia y cumplir su más grande sueño: "Terminar sus estudios universitarios".
texts.en:
Carla, 21, is a young entrepreneur who is single and lives in Chiclayo with her family.

She is very keen to get on in life. At the moment, she is studying nursing at university and she is doing well because she is a good student. She also sells lingerie.  She is a successful young woman because she is very responsible, hard-working and above all respectful and friendly towards her customers.

She is grateful to the Kiva lenders because with their support she can buy goods to strengthen her business. In this way she can generate more income and this will enable her to help her family and achieve her ultimate dream:  "To finish her university studies".

loans.use: to buy goods for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a sewing machine, an oversewing machine and a table.

loans.name: Adelaida

texts.en:
Adelaida is 44 years old and married with two children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Adelaida runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 21,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items like canned goods, soft drinks, snack foods, candies, biscuits, etc. to sell. She has been in this business for 22 years and sells a variety of items such as the above.

In the future, Adelaida would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional items like canned goods, soft drinks, snack foods, candies, biscuits, etc. to sell

loans.name: Ana Vilma

texts.es:
Ana tiene 47 años de edad, estudió hasta tercer grado, cuando ella era niña  sus padres no le daban mayor estudio a sus hijos  por eso no continuó en la escuela, está acompañada y tiene 5 hijos pero solo 3 personas dependen de ella.


Actualmente ella se dedica a trabajar en la elaboración de puros de tabaco y lo ha hecho desde que era niña, esto lo aprendió de su madre, además le ayuda a su pareja a trabajar en la agricultura., en la elaboración de los puros se involucra su madre y  no tiene un horario establecido ya que termina de trabajar hasta que finalizan con los pedidos.


Ans solicita este préstamo a CrediCampo para sembrar maíz y para comprar tabaco para continuar elaborando puros, pues hay momentos que tiene varios pedidos y por el efectivo no puede trabajar lo suficiente.


Los sueños de Ana son tener una mejor vivienda, ayudar a su madre económicamente para que ya no trabaje, sabe que es un compromiso pero con la ayuda de Dios y de los préstamos todo es posible.
texts.en:
Ana, 47, studied until third grade.  When she was a child, her parents were not able to provide her with a good education.  Therefore, she dropped out of school.  She is married and has five children, but at the moment, only three of them depend on her financially.

At the moment, she works in the production of cigars; a job which she has done since she was little.  She learnt the skills from her mother, who still helps her today.  She has no fixed working hours; she just finishes work when she has taken care of the orders.  Besides this, her husband works in agriculture.

Ana is asking for a loan from CrediCampo to sow corn and to buy tobacco so she can carry on making cigars.  At the moment, she has got a lot of orders but her lack of cash is making it hard for her to supply them.

She dreams of having a better home and helping her mum financially so that she doesn't have to work.  She knows that it is a lot, but with the help of God and the loaners, anything is possible.

loans.use: to sow corn and to buy tobacco for making cigars.

loans.name: Eusebio

texts.es: Don Eusebio es propietario de un café internet, tiene más de diez años de tenerlo y debido a eso muchos maestros y estudiantes visitan su negocio, pero necesita comprar material para poder brindarle un mejor servicio a sus clientes. Y por ello solicita el crédito. No tiene crédito en ninguna institución. Es padre de una niña de siete años y el lucha para darle lo mejor a su hija y a su esposa.
texts.en:
Eusebio is the owner of an internet cafe.  He has had it for more than ten years and lots of teachers and students use his business.   

For this reason, he needs to buy more equipment to offer them a better service. To do this he is asking for a loan. He does not have any credit with any other organization. 

He is the father of a seven-year-old girl and he strives to give his daughter and his wife the best in life.

loans.use: to buy equipment for an internet café.

loans.name: Esther

texts.es:
Esther tiene 49 años de edad, vive con su esposo en el distrito de Cayaltí, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Junto con su esposo tienen una pequeña tienda donde ofrecen productos de pasamanería y de bazar, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de variedad de productos para abastecer su tienda y de esta manera ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Esther is 49 and lives with her husband in Cayalti; a small community dedicated to agricultural work, trade and livestock.  It is located in the province of Chiclayo in Lambayeque on the northern coast of Peru.

Together with her husband, they have a small store where they sell bazaar and personal goods.  The store is located in their house and they have asked for a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 1,000 nuevos soles to buy a variety of products to stock the business and satisfy the customers.

loans.use: to buy a variety of goods to stock her store.

loans.name: Alejandrina

texts.es:
Alejandría tiene 53 años de edad, vive con su cónyuge, y sus hijos en el distrito de Zaña, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la cría y venta de animales menores en la parte posterior de su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos balanceados para engorde de los mismo y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Alejandra, 53, lives with her husband and children in Zaña; a village dedicated to agriculture, trade and livestock.  It is located in the province of Chiclayo in Lambayeque on the northern coast of Peru.

She raises and sells small animals in some space at the back of her house.  She has asked for a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 1,000 nuevos soles to buy animal feed to fatten them up.  This will help her to generate more of an income to help her family.

loans.use: to buy animal feed to fatten her animals.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan is a 46-year-old married woman with eight children, four of whom are currently in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Susan has a general store business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 25,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store. She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business. She has been in this business for 7 years. 

In the future, Susan would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Agustina

texts.en:
Agustina is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a rice retailing business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell. She has been in this business for 4 years, and also earns more income from food vending.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business. Agustina has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts and with the help of the loans from NWTF. 

She dreams of building and expanding her business to secure her family's future.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Antonio

texts.en:
Antonio works hard to support her family. She is married and has a buy-and-sell charcoal business in the Philippines.

She has requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to buy more sacks of charcoal to sell to her customers. She has been in this business for 10 years now.

Antonio would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of charcoal to sell to her customers

loans.name: Benita

texts.en:
Benita is a 36-year-old married woman with seven children, six of whom are currently in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Benita has a buy-and-sell firewood business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 13,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more stocks of firewood to sell to her customers. She has been in this business for 3 years. 

In the future, Benita would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of firewood to sell to her customers

loans.name: Conchita

texts.en:
Conchita is 61 years old and married with eight children.

Conchita works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stock to sell in her general store. She has borrowed and paid back 6 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 6 years, and also earns an income from frozen food vending.

Conchita aspires to build and expand her business to secure her family's future.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell in her general store

loans.name: Cresanta

texts.en:
Cresanta is a married woman with nine children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 62 years old and has one child who is still in school.

Cresanta has a weaving business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 12,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional raw materials for her weaving business.

Cresanta has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional raw materials for her weaving business

loans.name: Celine Tadja

texts.fr:
Née en 1988, Tadja est célibataire sans enfant. Elle fait le commerce de friperie et des pâtes dentifrice  depuis 2011 et réside dans le quartier Cassablanca. Elle s’approvisionne au marché de Hedzranawoé et  revend à la devanture de son domicile.
Elle sollicite un microcrédit pour agrandir et diversifier  son commerce  afin de répondre aux besoins des clients et maximiser  ces bénéfices.
texts.en:
Born in 1988, Tadja is single without children. She has been trading second-hand clothing and toothpaste since 2011 and resides in the Cassablanca neighborhood.

She resupplies at the Hédzranawoé market and resells at her homefront.

She is requesting a micro-credit loan to expand and diversify her business, so she can meet customer needs and maximize her profits.

loans.use: buy 3 dozen towels, 3 dozen shoes and toothpaste

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: Buy canned goods (canned milk, sardines, canned tomatoes, etc.)

loans.name: Annai Indhira Shg Group

texts.en:
Chitra is the featured borrower of “Annai Indhira” Self Help group, which contains five other members from the same locality of Naikkuppai village in Tamil Nadu. Chitra is 33 years old and her husband, Mr. Raman, is a farmer. They have two children and live in their own house. They also own some cultivatable land in their village. The group has been receiving loans from “PAT” under micro finance for the last seven years for the cultivation of paddy, cotton seeds etc.
 
Now Chitra and her group members are each seeking a loan to buy a smokeless stove that is produced by Grameen Infra. The stove costs INR 1400 each. This will help all the borrowers have a good environment in their home surroundings.

loans.use: to buy a smokeless stove

loans.name: Annaisanthiya Group

texts.en: Vasantha, along with five other married women from Edaiyanallur in Tamil Nadu, formed a group called ‘Annaisanthiya” to help each other through loans they took from the local NGO “PAT” to improve financial stability. For the last six years, they have received loans and repaid them successfully. Now they are seeking a loan to buy improved cook stoves. Until now, they have been relying on conventional stoves that run on firewood to cook food for their families. They spend over five hours every day in front of these cook stoves. They are directly exposed to heat and smoke emanating from the burning fuel, making them prone to various respiratory system diseases. After struggling for many years, these women decided to bring an end to their daily ordeal by purchasing improved cook stoves that produce a low amount of smoke. However, these women earn meager incomes from the various petty businesses they run and they are not financially sound enough to purchase the cook stoves. So, they are requesting a loan of INR 8,400 to buy six stoves. Your support will help these women breathe cleaner air and keep lung diseases at bay.

loans.use: to buy a smokeless stove

loans.name: Bharani Shg Group

texts.en:
Indhira is a leader of the “Bharani” Self-Help Group (SHG), which PAT has been supporting by giving them training and loans. The group consists of 19 members. The lady who is standing with her hand raised is Indhira. She lives in a small hamlet in a rural area, Keezhumanthur in Tanjore District. She is married to Mr. Narasiman and she has studied up to fifth grade. They have two children; her first son is in college and the second son is studying in +2 in the same village. They live in a house made of thatched roof. Her husband is a daily wage worker in agriculture fields. Indhira earns her livelihood by doing small income-generation activities.

Indhira and her group members have received loans from PAT before and have paid their dues promptly on time. All of them have used their previous loans to improve their livelihoods.

Indhira and her group members are looking forward to getting this Kiva loan to purchase a smokeless stove to use in the kitchen, which will help them to live healthier.

loans.use: to buy a smokeless stove

loans.name: Kalpana Chawla Shg Group

texts.en: Sudha (the lady who is standing with her hand raised) and her group are named after the renowned astronaut “Kalpana Chawla”. The group consists of 14 women who all live in Cippulilur, in the Tanjore district of Tamil Nadu, along with their children and husbands. They make a living by doing various small income-generating activities. These hardworking women, before commencing their businesses every morning, prepare breakfast and lunch for their families using primitive cook stoves that operate on firewood. They prepare dinner after closing their businesses at night. They spend 3-4 hours every day cooking, hence inhaling harmful smoke released by the burning of firewood. They are worried about endangering themselves and other family members with diseases such as bronchitis, lung cancer, pneumonia, etc. These women don’t want to turn a blind eye towards the adversities of using the primitive cook stoves. Rather, they wish to replace the old cook stoves with new, low-smoke ones. However, their marginal savings every month are not sufficient. So, they wish to procure a loan of INR 19,600 to purchase 14 cook stoves. They will repay the loan amount within the stipulated time period.

loans.use: to buy smokeless stove

loans.name: Alberto

texts.es:
Alberto tiene 44 años de edad, de estado civil casado, tiene 2 hijos vive con su familia en el Distrito de Oyotún, una zona rural, su población es amable, se dedican a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte.

El se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales, como patos, gallos, gallinas, pollos, tiene experiencia en el rubor desde hace varios años, su negocio está ubicado en la parte posterior de su domicilio.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 500 nuevos soles para la compra de variedad de animales menores como gallinas, patos y cuyes para ofrecer a sus clientes y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Alberto is 44 years old, married, and has two children.  He lives with his family in the district of Oyotún, a rural area whose population is kind and works in farming, commerce, and livestock.  It is located in the province of Chiclayo, which is part of the Lambayeque Region on the northern coast. 

His business is raising and selling animals, such as ducks, roosters, hens, and chickens; he has several years of experience in this profession and his business is located in the rear part of his home. 

He has requested a loan of 500 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy a variety of juvenile animals, such as hens, ducks, and guinea pigs to sell to his customers and thereby generate more income for his family.

loans.use: to buy a variety of juvenile animals, such as hens, ducks, and guinea pigs to sell to his customers.

loans.name: José Ricardo

texts.es:
José de 27 años de edad, estudió hasta noveno grado, él vive con su madre pues fue la única que se encargó de él porque su padre los abandonó.

José, antes trabajaba cultivando maíz, ahora presta servicios de militar y lo aprendió de un tío que también era militar, el cuartel donde trabaja está a 50 minutos de su casa yéndose en bus y viaja hacia el lugar una vez a la semana.


El crédito lo necesita para pagar una deuda que tiene su madre en una institución financiera y lo demás del dinero lo utilizará para construir una fosa (letrina). 

Él sueña con trabajar duro para ser mas disciplinado en su profesión de militar, y además planea casarse y procrear hijos.
texts.en:
José is 27 years old; he has a ninth-grade education; he lives with his mother, as she was the only one who took care of him because his father abandoned them.  

José used to work growing corn, but now does military work, which he learned from an uncle who was also in the military.  The station where he works is 50 minutes from his home by bus and he travels to it once a week. 

He needs this loan to repay a debt his mother owes to a financial institution and he will use the rest of the money to build a latrine.

He dreams of working hard to be more disciplined in his military profession and he also plans to marry and have children.

loans.use: to repay a loan his mother owes to a financial institution

loans.name: Luis Lucio

texts.es:
Luis Lucio tiene 40 años de edad, vive junto con su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Pucará, una comunidad de clima caluroso que se dedican a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia del mismo nombre que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte público, cuenta con una mototaxi propia con la cual brinda servicio de transporte en el distrito de Pucara desde hace tres años, también brinda alquiler de habitaciones en diversos estudiantes y trabajadores, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1 000 nuevos soles para el mantenimiento y reparación de su unidad móvil.
texts.en:
Luis Lucio is 40 years old and lives with his wife and children in the Pucará district, a place with warm weather. Locals work in agriculture, commerce and raising livestock. It is located in the Pucará province, which belongs to the region of Cajamarca, in the northern mountain ranges of Peru.

Luis Lucio offers transport services. He owns a rickshaw and has been using it to transport people in the district of Pucará for three years. He also rents out rooms to students and workers alike.

Luis Lucio is requesting a loan of 1,000 nuevos soles [PEN] at Epydme Alternativa to repair and carry out maintenance on his vehicle.

loans.use: to repair and carry out maintenance on his vehicle.

loans.name: Marilu

texts.es:
Marilú tiene 24 años de edad, vive con su cónyuge y sus menores hijos en El Sector El Palmo II, una zona rural del distrito de Cayaltí, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores desde hace tres años, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en la parte posterior de su domicilio, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1 500 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos balanceados para engorde de los mismo y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Marilú is 24 years old; she lives with her partner and their young children in the neighborhood of El Palmo II, a rural district of Cayaltí.  This is a farming, commercial, and ranching community that is located in the province of Chiclayo, which is part of the Lambayeque Region on Peru's northern coast. 

She has worked raising and selling small animals for three years; her business is located in the rear of her home. She has requested a loan of 1,500 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy feed to fatten them and thereby generate more income for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed to fatten her animals

loans.name: Domingo

texts.es:
Domingo tiene 37 años de edad, vive junto con su esposa e hijos en el Caserío San José del Lirio, una zona rural del Distrito de Callayuc, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Cutervo que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la destilación de aguardiente, una bebida procesada a base del jugo de la caña que se extrae mediante un trapiche un equipo artesanal movido por un toro que da vueltas a dos rodillos que chancan la caña para pasarlo por unos pequeños canales que Domingo ha elaborado y luego hervir este jugo.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 4 500 nuevos soles para la compra de un nuevo equipo de destilación que le permitirá trabajar con mayor rapidez y mayor extracción de jugo de caña para finalmente purificarlo y convertirlo en aguardiente.
texts.en:
Domingo is 37 tears old.  He lives with his wife and children in the small village of San José de Lirio, a rural area of the district of Callayuc, which is a farming, commercial, and ranching community located in the province of Cutervo in the region of Cajamarca in Peru's northern mountains. 

He distills aguardiente for a living.  This is a processed drink whose base is sugarcane juice, which is extracted using an artisanal mill that is powered by a bull walking around two rollers that crush the sugarcane so it runs down small channels that Domingo made.  This juice is later boiled. 

He has requested a loan of 4,500 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy new distilling equipment that will allow him to work faster and extract more sugarcane juice to later purify and convert into aguardiente.

loans.use: to buy new distilling equipment, which will allow him to work faster

loans.name: Flor De Maria

texts.es: Flor es propietaria de una venta de ropa americana en el cual ofrece a sus clientes ropa para damas, caballeros y niños. Solicita el crédito porque quiere comprar más ropa para surtir más su negocio y así obtener más ganancias para darle lo mejor a sus hijos. No tiene créditos en ninguna institución. Y se animo a solicitar un crédito en Fape porque escucho por medio de otra usuaria que el interés es sobre saldos y piensa que es una buena opción para su negocio y seguir creciendo.
texts.en: Flor owns a store where she sells American clothes. She sells clothes for women, men and children. She is requesting a loan to buy more clothes in order to have a wider assortment and increase her profits. This way, she will be able to give her children all the best. She has no loans with other institutions. She decided to request a loan at Fape because she heard from another member that the interest rate is charged based on the remaining amount owed. She thinks this is a good alternative to continue expanding her business.

loans.use: to buy used clothes to sell.

loans.name: Rosa Elvia

texts.es: Rosa tiene 61 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y su nieto. Rosa es una mujer ejemplar quien no se cansa de trabajar con el fin de mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia. Ella se gana la vida por medio de la venta de carne de res y de cerdo de forma ambulante. Tiene 42 años de dedicarse a este negocio el cual le ha permitido colaborar con la economía del hogar. Rosa desea mejorar las condiciones de su humilde casa por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena y hierro para construir una pared en vivienda que se encuentra en mal estado.
texts.en:
Rosa is 61 years old and lives with her husband and her grandson in a house of their own. Rosa is an exemplar woman who works tirelessly to improve her and her family’s living conditions. She makes a living out of selling beef and pork as a street vendor. She has been doing this for 42 years, and it has helped her to contribute to the family’s economy.

Rosa wants to improve her humble house and this is why she is requesting a loan at FUSAI. She will buy bricks, cement, sand and iron bars to rebuild a wall that is in bad shape.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand and iron bars to rebuild a wall.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sand, cement, bricks, gravel, and rebar to build a retaining wall

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in three bundles of clothing

loans.name: Karen  Estefany

texts.es: Keren tiene 19 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su pequeña hija de 2 años de edad. Karen tiene un pequeño negocio de venta bebidas gaseosas y choco bananos lo cual le permite apoyar con los gasto del hogar puesto que los ingresos que percibe su esposo trabajando como albañil no le permiten cubrir las principales necesidades de su familia. Karen solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de una pila y para reparar el baño. Con el monto solicitado comprará cemento, arena, ladrillo, grava y hierro.
texts.en:
Karen is 19 years old and lives with her life partner and her two-year-old daughter in a house of their own. Karen has a small store where she sells sodas and choco bananos [bananas covered in chocolate]. With this business, she can help to cover the home expenses, since her husband works as a mason and does not make enough to satisfy their needs.

Karen is requesting a loan at FUSAI to build a sink and repair the bathroom. She will buy cement, sand, bricks, gravel and iron bars.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, bricks, gravel and iron bars to build a sink and repair the bathroom.

loans.name: Cristino

texts.es:
Cristino tiene 59 años de edad, está casado y su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene 3 hijos pero solo uno depende de él.

Cristino tiene muchos años de experiencia trabajando la tierra, además trabajó durante 20 años en un corral ordeñando ganado, para llegar al lugar de la agricultura se va a las 4 de la madrugada en bus el cual tarda una hora de recorrido, y cultiva maíz y frijol.

Él necesita este crédito para comprar 8 sacos de abono, 3 de sulfato y 5 de fórmula, de esta forma se le estará ayudando a Cristino para que pueda seguir adelante con sus trabajos agrícolas y llevar el alimento al hogar.

Él sueña con que la cosecha sea excelente, y sabe que lo logrará trabajando muy fuerte y ahorrando, además sueña con reparar el techo de su casa pues no está en buenas condiciones.
texts.en:
Cristino is 59 years old and married. His wife works as a housewife. He has three children but only one depends on him. Cristino has many years of experience working the land. He also worked for twenty years milking cows. He takes a bus at 04:00 am to reach the place where he grows corn and beans. It takes him an hour to get there.

Cristino is requesting a loan to buy eight bags of compost, three of sulfate and five of a special fertilizer. This will help Cristino to continue working the land and to bring food to his family’s table. His dream is to have an excellent harvest and he knows that this will happen if he works hard and saves some money. He also dreams of repairing his roof, which is in bad conditions.

loans.use: to buy eight bags of compost, three of sulfate and five of a special fertilizer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pants, tops, shirts, swimming trunks, blouses, skirts, and dresses for her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fruits to sell.

loans.name: Dedilisa

texts.en:
Dedilisa works hard to support her family. She is married and has a abaca weaving business in the Philippines.

Dedilisa requested a loan of PHP 11,000 through NWTF to buy more raw materials like abaca fiber for her business.

Dedilisa has been in this business for twenty-seven years now.

In the future, Dedilisa would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more raw materials like abaca fiber

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
Emma is forty-two years old and married with two children.

She earns her living through a pig fattening business in the Philippines. Emma is borrowing PHP 23,000 through NWTF to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Emma has been in pig fattening for a year and also earns additional income from a general store.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Gaudiosa

texts.en:
As a married parent of eight children, Gaudiosa works hard to support her family.

She has a business selling lumber in the Philippines and also earns additional income from buying and selling mangoes. Gaudiosa is borrowing PHP 23,000 through NWTF to buy more lumber to sell in her lumber yard.

Gaudiosa has sustained her business activities through her past seventeen loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more lumber to sell in her lumber yard

loans.name: Estrella

texts.en:
Estrella is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a pig fattening business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to buy additional piglets, feed and other supplies for her pig fattening business.

Estrella has been in this business for twenty years. She earns additional income from a general store.

Estrella has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets, feed and other supplies for her business

loans.name: Fe

texts.en:
Fe works hard to support her family. She is married and has an abaca weaving business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for seven years.

Fe has requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more materials for her abaca weaving business.

In the future, Fe would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more materials for her abaca weaving business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to put a fence around her property, where she will later build a house.

loans.name: Luz Idalia

texts.es:
La señora LUZ  de 39  años  de edad es  soltera,  vive con sus tres hijas  en su casa de habitación, se dedica desde hace 17 años al negocio de venta de tortillas  ubicado en la comunidad de san Lorenzo, al sur de Honduras, en su negocio ella  vende, tortillas por la mañana, tarde y noche, sus clientes son los pobladores de su colonia y personas que pasan por la calle, Doña Luz es una persona trabajadora con deseos de salir adelante, ella está tratando de construir una casa en otro lugar. 
Doña LUZ está solicitando el préstamo para compra de cemento, hierro, grava y mano de obra  con el apoyo del crédito ella pretende ir mejorando su patrimonio es su séptimo préstamo que solicita a prisma y kiva. Es un cliente puntual en sus pagos, solo tiene créditos con Prisma. 
 Su sueño es mejorar su casa.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Mayo del 2014.
texts.en:
Luz is 39 years old and single. She lives with her three daughters. She has been selling tortillas for seventeen years in San Lorenzo, Southern Honduras. She sells tortillas in the morning, in the afternoon and in the evening. Her customers are locals and passersby. Luz is a hardworking person with a strong will to get ahead. She is trying to build a house somewhere else.

Luz is requesting a loan to buy cement, iron bars and gravel, and to pay for the labor. With this loan, she hopes to improve her property. This is her seventh loan with Prisma and Kiva. She pays the installments on time and only has loans from Prisma. Her dream is to improve her house.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - May 2014.

loans.use: to buy cement, iron bars and gravel, and to pay for the labor needed to make some home improvements.

loans.name: Sucena

texts.es:
La señora Sucena es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable vive en una comunidad al sur de Honduras junto a su familia. Su negocio es el alquiler de apartamentos, desde hace 10 años, la cual funciona en su casa de habitación en el municipio donde vive.
Doña Sucena necesita el préstamo para la compra de materiales como ladrillos, cemento, arena, grava, varillas, alambre dulce, arenilla, mano de obra y Pintura para  mejorar sus apartamentos  y seguir realizando esta actividad; la cual le brinda una gran parte de sus ingresos. Con el préstamo espera que su establecimiento se vea mejor y sea más grande así podrá tener más inquilinos, de esta forma aumentar sus ingresos, y gracias a esto poder mejorar la calidad de vida de la familia con el aumento de los ingresos en el hogar.
Ella espera en un corto plazo hacer crecer su establecimiento y  con esto poder seguir apoyando a su familia y que sus hijos tengan los estudios necesarios, para que puedan tener mayores oportunidades en la vida.

Choluteca, Honduras – Mayo 2014
texts.en:
Sucena is a very hard-working and responsible person who lives in the south of Honduras with her family. She has had an apartment rental business for the past 10 years. Her business is located at her house. Sucena needs the loan to purchase bricks, cement, sand, gravel, paint, steel rods, wire, grit, and paint amongst other materials, as well as to hire help. The expected impact of the loan is the improvement of her apartments, so that she can 
keep in business. These apartments are her main source of income. She hopes to make her apartments look nicer and make them bigger, so as to attract more tenants and increase her income. She wants to use this extra income to improve her family's standard of living. Sucena’s plans for the short term include continuing to make her business grow, so that she can keep supporting her family and help her children complete their studies and benefit from better opportunities when they grow up.

Choluteca, Honduras – May 2014

loans.use: to buy construction and painting supplies, as well as to hire help.

loans.name: Dúo La Sexta Group

texts.es: Dúo la Sexta este grupo esta conformado por la señora evelyn Yamilec de 19 años de edad, a su corta edad esta trabajando en su negocio posee una tienda de consumo diario desde hace varios años, en esta oportunidad esta solicitando este credito para la compra de unsumos para su tienda, esperando que le puedan ayudar con el credito solicitado
texts.en: One of the members of the communal bank Dúo la Sexta is Yamelic who is 19.  At her young age she owns a grocery store where she has been working every day for several years.  On this occasion she is requesting a loan to buy supplies for her store.  She counts on your support for this loan.

loans.use: To buy supplies for her store.

loans.name: Camila Alejandra

texts.es: Camila es una joven, emprendedora que a base de sueños se ha proyectado como una gran empresaria ye s por eso que desde que trabaja siempre en cada pago ahorraba un pequeño capital para comenzar a formar su idea, como negocio siempre ha soñado con una tienda donde distribuye helados, y frituras buscando siempre el beneficio de su familia, de sus hijos su propio beneficio y es por esta razón que solicita un crédito para la compra de insumos como helados y frituras pues con sus ahorro ha logrado pagar el alquiler de un local ya que será su primer paso a la independencia será un paso al progreso a cumplir sus sueños de forjar con sus manos un futuro más prometedor
texts.en:
Camila is a young entrepreneur who sees herself as a future businesswoman. This is why she has been saving money since she started working in order to give shape to her business idea. She always dreamed of having an establishment where she could sell ice cream and fried food, thinking of her family’s and her own wellbeing.

This is why Camila is requesting a loan to buy supplies such as ice cream and fried food. With her savings, she has been able to pay for the rent of a place. This represents her first step toward independence and toward achieving her dream of paving her own way to a promising future.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as ice cream and fried food for her business.

loans.name: Liliam Marlem

texts.es:
La señora Liliam es una mujer dedicada y muy trabajadora, ella se dedica al comercio y su negocio es la venta de baleadas, esto lo realiza hace 14 meses, su negocio se ubica en su casa y está en un punto muy bueno por estar en la zona comercial de su barrio, ella se levanta muy temprano a atender sus clientes, ella inicio su negocio, por la falta de empleo en la zona y gracias a su negocio ahora tiene empleada a otra persona.
Doña Liliam solicita el apoyo del préstamo para la compra de producto como ser, laminas de zinc para ampliación de negocio, también compra de producto maseca, frijoles, huevos manteca, chorizo y otros productos.
Ella sueña con tener un negocio amplio y poder mejorar su clientela esto mejorara sus ingresos y su condición de vida 

Danlí El Paraíso, Honduras - Mayo 2014
texts.en:
Liliam is a dedicated, hard-working woman who makes and sells "baleadas" (stuffed tortillas).  She has been in business for 14 months and works out of her home which is in a strategic location near her neighborhood's shopping center.  She gets up early in the morning to attend to customers.  Liliam strated her business due to the lack of employment in the area, and thanks to her business she is able to employ another person.

Liliam is requesting a loan to buy metal sheeting to expand her locale, and also to buy corn, beans, eggs, lard, chorizo and other products.  Her dream is to have a larger business and increase the number of customers to earn more income and improve her lifestyle.


Danlí el Paraíso, Honduras - May 2014

loans.use: To buy metal sheeting to expand her business.  She also will buy corn, beans, eggs, lard and chorizo for her food business.

loans.name: Lesly Yaquelin

texts.es:
La joven LESLY  de 25 años de edad,  tiene  un hijo que depende de ella y de su esposo que también le ayuda en sus gastos,  vive con su hijo y su conyugue en casa de familiar  radica en la comunidad del tular, en Nacaome, valle. Al sur de Honduras, y se dedica desde hace 3  años  al negocio de la venta de ropa nueva como ser: pantalones, blusas, camisas de hombre, ropa interior, sandalias, sus clientes son los amigos de su comunidad y vecinos, su venta es de forma ambulante ya que ella sale a pie y en autobús a las aldeas y caseríos para poder vender sus productos.
LESLY está solicitando el préstamo para la compra de ropa nueva como pantalones, blusas, camisas de hombre, ropa interior, sandalias, ya que tiene varios pedidos para esta época de la feria de San Lorenzo, está  muy contenta de seguir trabajando con prisma y kiva.
Es su tercer crédito que solicita a prisma.
 Su sueño es tener una casa.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Mayo del 2014.
texts.en:
Lesly, 25, and her husband have a dependent son and they share household expenses.  They live in a community in Tular in Nacaome in southern Honduras.  For three years she has been selling new clothing such as pants, blouses, men's shirts, lingerie and sandals.  Her customers are friends and neighbors in the community.  She works as a street peddlar and travels by bus to villages and rural areas to sell her products.

Lesly is requesting a loan to buy new clothing such as pants, blouses, men's shirts, lingerie and sandals, since she has many orders for the upcoming San Lorenzo fair.  She is happy to continue working with Prisma and Kiva.  This is her third loan through Prisma and her goal is to have her own home one day.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - May 2014

loans.use: To buy pants, blouses, men's shirts, lingerie and sandals for her business.

loans.name: Mwizero Ii Group

texts.fr:
Floribert fait partie du groupe Mwizero  et  habite à Gitega. Il a 39  ans et est marié à A. Marie, une commerçante. Ensemble ils ont 4 enfants tous étudient.

Il fait le commerce de  viande  depuis  20 ans. 

Il est à son seizième crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il obtient, il  va  augmenter son capital et acheter une vache pour avoir une grande quantité de viande  à revendre, pour gagner plus. 

Dans les années  prochaines, il  voudrait  acheter une parcelle et voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Floribert belongs to the Mwisero group and lives in Gitega. He is 39 years old and married to A.Marie, a trader. They have four children together, who are all studying.

He has been selling meat for the past 20 years and is on his 16th loan from Turame. With the Kiva loan he is granted, he is going to increase his capital and buy a cow so that he can have a large quantity of meat to resell and earn more money.

Over the coming years he would like to buy a plot of land and see his children through school.

loans.use: to increase his capital and buy a cow so he can have a large quantity of meat to resell and earn more money.

loans.name: Nestor Javier

texts.es:
Néstor Toda la vida ha sido un aficionado a la tecnología, se involucraba en cualquier proyecto donde pudiera aprender a manejar los equipos como cámaras fotográficas, computadores cámara de videos siempre estaba presente hasta que llegó un momento de su vida donde decidió hacer de su hobby su actividad económica y es que para triunfar en un trabajo primero hay que amar lo que haces y es por eso que desde hace ya un buen tiempo Néstor se dedica a la atención de proyectos donde se involucre toma fotográficas, edición de videos etc etc. 
Néstor debe estar en constantes capacitaciones y estar al tanto de actualidad tecnológica y debido a que estas capacitaciones tienen un costo muchas veces se ve corto de capital para invertir en su negocio y es por esta razón que solicita un crédito para la compra de una cámara de alta calidad con la que podrá atender un nicho de mercado que le solicita estos servicios pues su trabajo es profesional y con buen costo convirtiéndose este en su principal sueño y con el que ganara más capital para vivir cómodamente con su familia
texts.en:
Néstor has been a fan of technology all of his life.  He always has gotten involved in any project where he could learn to handle equipment, such as cameras, computers, and video equipment.  But the moment came in his life when he decided to turn his hobby into a source of income, since being successful at something means you should be passionate about it.  So, quite some time ago Néstor decided to go into photography, video editing, etc.

Néstor must get constant training and always stay abreast of new technology.  Since training is expensive, he is frequently lacking capital for his business.  Therefore, he is requesting a loan to buy a quality camera so he can cover a niche market that requires his services.  His work is professional and well priced, so this is his main goal along with earning more income to live comfortably with his family.

loans.use: To buy a professional camera to cover events he cannot do now due to a lack of equipment.

loans.name: Kafui

texts.fr:
Agée de 33 ans, Kafui est célibataire sans enfant. Elle vit à Cassablanca et vend des sacs de sortie Dame. Elle achète ces sacs à main au grand marché de Lomé et les revend sous un hangar à son domicile. Kafui effectue ce commerce depuis  2011.
Elle sollicite ce prêt  pour agrandir son commerce et augmenter  ces bénéfices.
texts.en:
Kafui is 33 years old, single and she has no children. She lives in Cassablanca and sells women's handbags. She buys these bags at Lomé's Grand Market and resells them in a shed at her home. She has been carrying out this business since 2011. 

Kafui is requesting this loan to expand her business and increase her profits.

loans.use: to buy 22 bags.

loans.name: Luz Aracely

texts.es:
La señora LUZ  de  31  años de edad, vive con su conyugue  y un hijo no tiene casa propia ella alquila, se dedica desde hace 02 años al negocio de venta de abarrotería en su negocio ella vende  frescos, churros, frijoles, arroz, maíz, leña, lácteos, jabón, etc. Radica en la cuidad de san Lorenzo al sur de Honduras, ella es una mujer emprendedora con deseos de salir adelante y lucha día con día para ahorrar para hacer su casa.
LUZ está solicitando el préstamo para compra de productos para surtir la pulpería,  como pollo, arroz, frijoles, maseca, manteca, jabón, frescos, etc. con el apoyo de este crédito ella pretende mejorar sus ingresos y también su calidad de vida, es un cliente nuevo con deseos de trabajar con Prisma y Kiva.
Su sueño es tener un buen negocio bien surtido.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Mayo del 2014.
texts.en:
Luz, 31, lives with her husband and son in a rented home.  For two years she has been running a grocery store where she sells fresh produce, donuts, beans, rice, corn, firewood, dairy products, soap, etc.  It is located in the city of San Lorenzo in southern Honduras.  She has an entrepreneurial spirit and is determined to get ahead; struggling daily to save for a house.

Luz is requesting a loan to buy products for her grocery store such as chicken, rice, beans, corn, shortening, soap, fresh produce, etc.  With the loan she wants to improve her income and quality of life.  She is a new customer with a desire to work with Prisma and Kiva.  Her goal is to have a well-stocked business.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - May, 2014.

loans.use: To buy chicken, rice, beans, corn, lard, soap, fresh produce, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Maria Amparo

texts.es:
La señora María,  vive en la ciudad de Santa Cruz De Yojoa,  Un municipio al norte de Honduras desde hace muchos años, siendo una mujer muy trabajadora, responsable, y muy admirable debido a que ella sola cuida de su familia por el inesperado fallecimiento de su esposo ya hace 4 años  ella es muy conocida por la toda la aldea. Doña María es propietaria de pulpería “Emmanuel “la cual brinda sus servicios a toda la aldea ya que le gusta mantener su pulpería bien surtida y ofrece variedad de muchos productos y debido a esto cuenta con buena clientela.
Doña María cuenta con sus clientes fijos ya que es bien reconocido, gracias a este negocio ha logrado salir  adelante debido a sus virtudes y su gran esfuerzo como madre soltera solicita el préstamo de  10,000.00 lempiras para poder invertirlo en la compra de más productos como maíz, manteca, jabón, aceite, azúcar, harina, pan, café, lácteos, embutidos, churros y refrescos para el mayor surtimiento de su pulpería y así poder rendir más y poder obtener mejores ganancias.
Doña María  uno de sus más grandes sueños es llegar a tener una pulpería mucho más abastecida y así  poder seguir brindando un servicio de calidad a todos sus clientes y brindarle a sus hijos una mejor educación y un mejor futuro económico. 
Santa Cruz De Yojoa, Cortes. Honduras- Mayo del 2014
texts.en:
María has been living for many years in Santa Cruz de Yojoa, a municipality located in Northern Honduras. She is a hardworking, responsible and admirable woman who has taken care of her family on her own since her husband died unexpectedly, four years ago. She is well-known locally.

María owns a grocery store called “Emmanuel”, where she sells goods to the local people. She likes to always offer a wide assortment, so she sells a wide variety of products. This is why she has a good customer base. María has loyal customers and her business has a good reputation. Thanks to her business and her hard work, she has been able to get ahead as a single mother.

María is requesting a loan of 10,000 lempiras [HNL] to buy more products, such as corn, butter, soap, vegetable oil, sugar, flour, bread, coffee, dairy products, cold cuts, churros and beverages, and keep her stock at good levels. This will make her more productive and will help her to increase her profits.

One of María’s biggest dreams is to own a store with an even wider variety of products in order to better serve her customers, be able to pay for her children’s education and improve her economy in the future.

Santa Cruz De Yojoa, Cortes. Honduras- May 2014

loans.use: to buy supplies for her grocery store, such as corn, butter sugar and coffee.

loans.name: Akou

texts.fr:
Mariée  et  mère de deux enfants, Akou a 28 ans et réside à Cassablanca. Elle est couturière de formation  mais depuis 2013 commerçante de légume. 
EN début de cette année, Akou a commencé la vente des slips et des soutiens gorge dans son quartiers et ses environs. Elle parcours en moyenne 12 km par jour. Elle s’approvisionne  au marché au grand marché de Lomé.
Elle sollicite un prêt pour agrandir son commerce en acheter les slips et habits ce qui la permettra de faire plus de bénéfices et participer aux dépenses familiaux.
texts.en:
Married with two children, Aku is 28 years old and lives in Cassablanca. She is a seamstress by training but since 2013 she is a vegetable retail merchant.

Beginning of this year, Aku started selling panties and bras in her neighborhood and its surrounding area. She travels on average 12 kms a day, and resupplies at the main market in Lomé. 

She is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying undergarments and clothes, which will enable her to make more profit and contribute towards family expenditures.

loans.use: buy 10 dozen sets of clothes and 15 dozen undergarments

loans.name: Dukore I Group

texts.fr:
Pascasie fait partie du groupe  Dukore I et  habite à Gitega. C’est une veuve  de  49 ans. Elle a 5 enfants  dont 2 étudient. 

Elle fait le commerce de  restaurant  depuis  20 ans. 

Elle est à son seizième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter  une grande quantité de haricot, de riz, patate douce,… à revendre cuits dans son restaurant, pour gagner plus.
texts.en:
Pascasie belongs to the Dukore I group and lives in Gitega. She is a 49-year old widow and has five children, two of who are studying. 

She has been running a restaurant business for the past 20 years and is on her 16th loan from Turame. With the Kiva loan she is granted she is going to increase her capital and buy a large quantity of beans, rice, sweet potatoes..., which she will resell, once cooked, in her restaurant, so she can earn more money.

loans.use: to increase her capital and buy a large quantity of beans, rice, sweet potatoes...to resell, once cooked, in her restaurant, so she can earn more money.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy sets of plates and charcoal.

loans.name: Gensie

texts.en:
Gensie is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Gensie is 38 years old and has two children who are currently in school.

Gensie has an abaca-weaving business in the Philippines. Gensie requested a 13000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase additional raw materials for her business.

Gensie has been in this business for 6 years. In the future, Gensie would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional raw materials for her business

loans.name: Haide

texts.en:
Haide is a married woman with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Haide is 33 years old and has three children who are currently in school.

Haide has a native basket weaving business in the Philippines. Haide requested a 12000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more materials for her weaving business.

Haide has been in this business for 2 years. In the future, Haide would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy more materials for her weaving business

loans.name: Heizel

texts.en:
Heizel is 26 years old and married with one child.

Heizel works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 10000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more canned goods, snack foods, beers, soft drinks, noodles, and other groceries to sell. 

Heizel has borrowed and paid 1 loan from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 2 years and also earns an income from farming vegetables.

Heizel aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more canned goods, snack foods, beers, soft drinks, noodles, and other groceries to sell.

loans.name: Guillermo Alcides

texts.es:
Guillermo de 35 años de edad,  estudio en la escuela de su comunidad hasta sexto grado. Esta acompañado desde hace 7 años y hasta la fecha tiene 3 hijos, dos varones y una hembra. Su compañera de vida,  se dedica al trabajo de oficios domésticos, cuida a los niños y por las tardes hace ventas de nuegados y enchiladas, estos son antojitos que a los habitantes del lugar le gustan.
 

El cliente tiene un trabajo estable, trabaja desde hace 4 años en el mantenimiento de una iglesia evangélica y también trabaja la agricultura de 2 de la tarde en adelante y tiene experiencia de 20 años.
